avgDisclaimerUrl.description: URL that points to privacy handling document. Is used in `avgDisclaimer`.

avgDisclaimer.description: Text that outlines the use of privacy related information

consentToContactSharing.description: The message to ask for consent to share contact information

headerTitle.description: The title to show in the header of the application, next to the logo

manifestShortName.description: PWA `short_name` property value. Should not exceed 12 characters. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Add-ons/WebExtensions/manifest.json/short_name for reference

organisationName.description: Name of the organisation managing the incidents application instance

siteTitle.description: Application title showing up in the title bar and search results

smallHeaderTitle.description: The title to show in the small version of the header

manifestName.description: PWA title value. See https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/AppleApplications/Reference/SafariHTMLRef/Articles/MetaTags.html#:~:text=apple%2Dmobile%2Dweb%2Dapp%2Dstatus%2Dbar%2Dstyle,-Sets%20the%20style&text=If%20set%20to%20black%20%2C%20the,displayed%20below%20the%20status%20bar for reference
